availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Benjamin William Penick (Green County Home Guard)

body.p: Green County, Kentucky, retail dealer and trader. Green County native. Son of Thomas B. Penick. Attended Columbia High School. Graduate of Georgetown College in 1860. Retail dealer in Green County, Kentucky in 1861. Married to Elizabeth F. Brummal Penick. Father of Brummal Penick, Mary Lewis Penick Lewis, Sylvan Hundly Penick, and William Clifton Penick. Captain in the Green County Home Guard in 1861. Partner with Isaac W. Ingram in Ingram & Penick in Green County in 1864 and 1865.
